title: Cloob
description: Cloob is a social media platform. The brand features a bold and vibrant color palette primarily consisting of dark blue (213E97), a warm orange (FFAC25), a bright red (D0002C), and the dynamic orange-red tone (FF4816). These colors reflect the dynamic and energetic nature of the brand, and their details can be found on the official brand website and logo source pages.
